Ingredients.1: 1.5 cups smoked salmon, torn or cut into bite-sized pieces

Ingredients.3: 3 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice, or more to taste

Ingredients.4: 1 freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Combine smoked salmon, creme fraiche, lemon juice, and a generous grinding of coarse black pepper in the food processor; blend until smooth.

Directions.2: Spoon into a bowl, adjust seasoning, and chill for about 1 hour before serving. Garnish with fennel fronds.
